samaharunge aadare wena kenek ayithi karagena .samarunta demawupiyange sathuta wenuwen thamange aadare kapa karanna wela .thawath samaharunta thaman aadare karana kenage sathuta eyage anagathe wenuwen ee dennage aadare kapa karanna wela .thawath samaharu waradi watahim athi karagena wishwasaya nathi karagena anawabodaya nisa thaman mulu sansarema pathagena aapu ee aadare atha arala dala depaththaka idan duk widinawa .samaharu thaniyama duk widinawa .anith kena thawa aadareka patalila eeth ee ki kalekatada .kawada hari eyata danunoth thamange aththa aadare meka nemeyi mata galapenama kena eya eyama man kisima therumak nathi hethuwakata , samahara wita kisima hethuwak nathuwa man nathi kara gaththa kiyala .mulu jiwithe gewila iwara wenakan ee pasu thawima thamange hithara danewi .me loke kagen hanguwath thamange hruda sakshiyata boru karanna ba .hithin hugak duk widinawa .eeth parakku wadiyi .aapahu harenna ba .
